description:
It`s the final day of the Wake Up, Girls! tour.
Vdol Makina X is performing in multiple stadiums, the I-1 club is competing for its center position, and local idols across the country are holding simultaneous concerts under the banner of "Wake Up, Idols!"
In order to help their opening act, Run, Girls, Run! relax, the members of WUG take action...!
Source: crunchyroll
